website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty mesh bag that can help you carry a lot of gear while remaining breathable for wet items.
pros: Consists of a 600D polyester mesh, ensuring it'll be tough enough to hold all of your gear
Mesh allows gear to air dry as you carry it
Handles work well for carrying it as a tote with your hands or over the shoulder
Large size for a duffel-style bag
cons: Handles are not as comfortable to carry over the shoulder as they should be

customer_reviews.title: Large , durable gear bag
customer_reviews.text: I’m using it for kayak gear. Held about 30 lbs gear and used straps as shoulder straps. Will fit it kayak easily when emptied for camping trips when space minimal. Zipper not heavy duty, but ok. I like the extra storage pocket for smaller stuff. I took photo with guitar to give better idea of size
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P.

customer_reviews.title: NICE BIG BAG
customer_reviews.text: The bag comes folded inside out and into itself to make a nice transportable bag when not filled with your favorite goodies. Got it folded back right-side-out and the look anf feel is good. Good heavy duty zipper, an inside bag sealed compartment, and plenty of room for our beach gear to include rollup mats, fins, snorkles, mats, gloves, diving knife, etc. Nice carrying strap to haul it all around. Looking forward to taking this to Hawaii with us on next trip.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I've had an exhaustive search to try to find the right beach/swimming bag. This one may be THE ONE. The mesh is strong and the bag is large and well-constructed. There is one zippered pocket on the end (unfortunately, it's on the wrong end--accessed when you fully open the bag). Zipper seem good quality. I have tried other bags and have been disappointed in rubberized coatings, fragile nylon or PVC mesh, cheap zippers. I repeat, this bag may be THE ONE. Recommended! Wish list: more centrally located pocket or a zippered pocket on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Great for sweaty gym stuff
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this (as well as another similar bag) to hold fencing equipment. Jackets and knickers get very sweaty and can make your other equipment (masks, blades) rust. So I thought a diving equipment bag would be a good solution to the problem. It's light - no structure to it, so don't expect it to stand open like a heavier bag might. But it holds the gear just fine and lets everything dry out w/o rusting. Very functional.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a gym bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is huge, I use it for the gym, boxing and Muy Thai all my gear fits with space to spare. It has an inside pouch for my keys and wallet. The only I would say that I wish it had was a small outside pouch instead of inside the bag. Other than that this bag is great
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Orueta

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry all dive gear
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for scuba gear -- fits all my gear easily, and the straps are long enough to toss over my shoulder for an easy trek from hotel to dive boat. Given airlines' tendency to be rough on checked luggage, I packed the bag inside a suitcase for air travel, but more to protect my gear than the bag. However, it has stood up well to multiple boat dives. The mesh allows water to drain off quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Netmom

customer_reviews.title: Well made light dive gear bag
customer_reviews.text: The construction appears to be very good. For a bag this size, though, additional circumferential straps should be consideed. The mesh allows good air flow to avoid mildewing, and the dry pocket at one end gives some protection to wallet and dive log. In my 57 years of diving experience, stitching and zippers are the weak points of most gear bags. The zipper on this bag is double-ended, and appears to be of high quality, and the stitching is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT LIGHTWEIGHT HOLD-ALL
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this hold all. As you would expect it is lightweight, but very durable. It is a great size for keeping all of your snorkeling gear in one place. The mesh fabric ensures your equipment dries without anything getting moldy. Finally, it is a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: KS DEED

customer_reviews.title: A must For every boater or diver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a boat bag, we put our anchor ropes, lifevests, emergency blankets, and bumpers. I purchased 3 and even use one for my boat cover because it breathes and will not mold. Highly recommend these for any boater. Can be used for just about anything that you wish to not mold too.
customer_reviews.author: Nickels

customer_reviews.title: Might be okay for snorkeling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to use as a boat bag for my scuba gear. After getting the bag I felt it much too light weight and flimsy. I sent it back. I did get another Athletico bag the "Mesh Travel Backpack " from Amazon and it MUCH better suited for scuba gear and highly recommend. In my opinion this bag is probably okay as a gym bag or snorkel bag but not scuba.
customer_reviews.author: Arc

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This mesh bag held snorkel gear for a family of 8, with no issues whatsoever! This included our life jackets and water booties too. Heavy duty enough to accommodate our gear and lightweight enough that carrying it all wasn’t cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: eLizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Decent bag but not at this price
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice sized bag but isn't the highest quality. Cheap zipper, material - but it's good enough for my needs. I may not have kept it / returned but I really needed for an upcoming trip and wouldn't have time to send back. Again - it's OK but not great.
customer_reviews.author: hgpilot - MM

customer_reviews.title: Good SCUBA bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bag several times a week to carry my scuba gear, so far everything works well. The only complaint is that I'm nervous for how long the zipper will hold up. It's good for now, but unsure if it will last.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Well made bag
customer_reviews.text: First impression is this bag is well thought out and made. It has strips that go around the bag that help support the handles. I've tested it with my gear, BCD with 10lbs of weight, wetsuit, fins and my regulator and it holds everything with a little room to spare. I'm looking forward to testing it out on a dive trip next month.
customer_reviews.author: HARRY E. REICH

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kiteboarding gear
customer_reviews.text: Finally a bag that I can fit all my gear! The mesh lets water and sand drain. An internal pocket for smaller/more delicate items and a key pocket. Only used it twice so far, but it seems sturdy like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jack C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Gym, if you have a lot of stuff like me.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is much larger than expected. Would have gotten the next size smaller, but the bag itself is excellent. Side pouch for small items, and a ton of space for all of my gym accessories. Excellent Purchase. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: T Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Can’t handle the scads of pads
customer_reviews.text: Got this for martial arts equipment and clothing.the bag itself is great and The mesh keeps the smell down but the straps are already wearing out. I will probably try to repair it but won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Definitely bigger than I expected, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: So the picture is a tad deceiving, I'm a pretty big guy, but this bag is pretty enormous, I bought it as a gym bag that can breathe, and I could fit like two week's worth of clothes in it, it's huge, gotta be over 3 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: Justin G. Luttrell

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Lightweight, Durable
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that it could use more internal pouches for smaller items, but otherwise this bag is perfect for wetsuits, large fins, etc. It's also very lightweight yet also durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Hold my volleyball net and equipment perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my volleyball gear - large net, 2 balls, ropes for boundaries, etc because I needed a large bag to carry it all when we play every week and everything fit perfectly and the bag is durable and easy to open, close and carry. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: miranda

customer_reviews.title: Extra large size is great!
customer_reviews.text: Very large. Fit 5 sets of snorkel gear including ocean fins. And still have room to spare. One issue...product arrived wirh zipper closed and inside out. Had a terrible time trying to open zipper when bag was inside out.
customer_reviews.author: Melodee J. Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Durable, plenty of space and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this bag. I can carry all of my tech dive scuba gear with ease. No issues tearing. Space isn’t an issue either. Pleanty of space. I pack my BCD, Full face mask, Spare mask, RK3 fins, Felt bottomed boots, 3 mm body suit, flashlights, dive computers, knife, dive shorts and other miscellaneous accessories. I even pack water bottles, beef jerky or tuna and a jacket Incase of cold weather in between dives. Also carry 16 lbs of weights. The bag can be folded and sealed inside the zipper container that is self contained within the bag when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for Scuba gear
customer_reviews.text: Son and I both have this for our Scuba gear that we use and its great. If you have everything you can use this as well as it has plenty of room and designed not to keep water inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This bag was very useful when going on dive trips. I used it in my suitcase also to compress my equipment. It allowed me extra room for more clothes.
customer_reviews.author: camcam

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bag! Holds all my gear.
customer_reviews.text: This bag for the price, is quite nice. Holds all my gear including wetsuit plus fins easily and the mesh allows you to pack wet items. One wish is for an internal zip pocket, but other than that, I like this bag.
customer_reviews.author: gregg333

customer_reviews.title: Only bag you need
customer_reviews.text: Very large bag that will fold up and zip in side it self for storage. Got a set of 16 fins 3 dive mask 2 full face snorkeling mask and still got room plus it all air drys be the time I get home
customer_reviews.author: kevin dennis

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased this and works as advertised. Seems durable and zipper is sturdy. Fits all of our snorkeling gear enough for four people. Great bag.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Needed bag to carry scuba diving equipment
customer_reviews.text: Needed a bag to carry 2 sets of wetsuits,boots,find, snorkel, mask, & snorkel bags all in one easy to carey mesh bag. Worked perfect. Seems will take abuse fine.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON_BUYER

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Out of everything I’ve bought online, I recommend this more than anything else. This is a must have, I don’t go diving without it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Ray

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good value
customer_reviews.text: Great boating bag for our tubing supplies. Holds my tow ropes, pump and 4 adult size life vests. Sturdy and seems durable. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Mycrobyte

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing and so roomy for all of my scuba gear! I was able to fit everything I needed for the day (incl wetsuit and flippers) and it doesn’t slide around on the boat. Easy access. I am real happy I bought this and am ready to buy another one for my Ultimate Frisbee gear (discs, cones, etc) it’s a great sport bag!
customer_reviews.author: cynth

customer_reviews.title: It’s large and wear it as a backpack is a bonus!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this duffel bag bc I have two little toddlers, and I need all the hands I can get, this duffle bag has made our trips to the beach so much easier, I can hold almost everything in it,it’s very large, I highly recommend purchase esp. for the beach! Straps are large enough to wear the bag as backpack as well!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize how big it is. Way too big for my stuff. But it does fit a lot and is very light weight. Mesh allows things to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, strong and light
customer_reviews.text: This bag has worked great for the scuba class I'm taking. I can tote all of my snorkel gear, as well as my BCD and regulator. I'm sure it will fit a wetsuit too. I like that its all mesh so that everything can air out and dry after I use it
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Get's the job done
customer_reviews.text: I no longer have to chase all of my snorkel gear around. I'm able to store the gear for two people while the mesh makes it so the equipment can dry out while it is bagged up and leaves most of the pesky sand behind. The fact that the internal pocket is also reversible to be able to contain the rest of the bag in a smaller area for storage when not in use is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I am not a diver , however this is the perfect gym bag, I’m a Muay Thai fighter and went I’m done all equipment is soaking with sweat, leaving hand wraps on a close bag by mistake is deadly... but thi takes care of that problem by letting my equipment breath no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Milton Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Easy storage. High capacity. Well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product EASY STORAGE it folds up and zippers flat! This one is actually TOO BIG. But if you have masks snorkel fins and other gear give it a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Lowy

customer_reviews.title: A nice bag for my gear
customer_reviews.text: This bag is quite large and holds all my dive gear without having to cram it all in a bag. It’s all mesh so the water drains and it dries fast.
customer_reviews.author: J-Ro

customer_reviews.title: Everything fit easily
customer_reviews.text: I received the dive bag on Thursday and by Friday it was loaded up with my BC, mask, fins, etc. everything fit easily. I was even able to throw in a few towels, my log book in the inside zipper, phone, wallet and keys. This bag is perfect for loading up ALL of your dive gear and headed out for a little time underwater.
customer_reviews.author: Josh C

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be well built
customer_reviews.text: Quality appears to be good. I will need to use it a while to see how it stands up too wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: IT PM

customer_reviews.title: Good SCUBA Gear Bag
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mesh bag. The mesh is heavy duty (got this for scuba gear). It is large and will easily fit set of scuba regs, wetsuit, BCD. Handles are sturdy. Zipper seems solid, but I wouldn't push the limit. No issues to date.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very light and "airy"
customer_reviews.text: Lots of holes to let your equipment dry better and not carry water back home or back the car. Fits a wetsuit, and all diving equipment.
customer_reviews.author: bob 2012

customer_reviews.title: Scuba Dive Bag.  It all Fits!
customer_reviews.text: All my sons Scuba equipment fits inside this large mesh bag. Even his wetsuit (youth sized). BCD, regulator, fins, mask/snorkel, booties, (minus weights of course). All the basics with room to spare. Time will tell how the zipper holds up. Just need to rinse the salt off after use as usual. Add zipper wax periodically.
customer_reviews.author: ToneWoodSound

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: No structure. it takes the shape of whatever you put in it
customer_reviews.author: Scott V.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this dive duffel bag. I needed a good beach bag for some floating tubes we use at the beach and this bag is perfect. It’s made of a good quality mesh and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shipping but excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product and terrible shipping process. Arrived late but excellent product for aquatic equipment
customer_reviews.author: NV

customer_reviews.title: Roomy!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for four dives this past weekend. Large enough for all my equipment including fins. Love the inside pocket! Seems sturdy and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: troublemaker

customer_reviews.title: Great Size, strong handles and easy to pack!
customer_reviews.text: We have been looking for a mesh bag that would fit our dive gear for a while. This is the first one that looked like it would carry all the gear in one bag. We love the size, and that it easily folds up to put in the suitcase. We are going diving next month so are excited to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Dize

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect driving bag, extremely easy to clean, very lightweight, perfect design for portability
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Feels high quality. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Radulescu

customer_reviews.title: all divers need this bag
customer_reviews.text: use this all the time! All my scuba gear fits!
customer_reviews.author: tarzan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of room for 2 sets of fins masks snorkels regulators and change of clothes. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: dennis gryder

customer_reviews.title: Great Dive Bag for a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: I like the design and construction of the bag and the ability to fold it for packing.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag for water rescue gear
customer_reviews.text: Good sized bag for all my water rescue gear. Appears to be built sturdy. Looking forward to seeing how it holds up getting tossed around over the years. Ive already recommended this to some coworkers.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Drees

customer_reviews.title: Scuba equipment
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby. He is getting certified for diving. Holds a lot of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: SheilaD

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size. That makes it easy to pull all of my gear into without struggling.
customer_reviews.author: Number1954

customer_reviews.title: Good material mesh bag
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy bag. Heavy enough material. Good straps. Good zipper. Only time will tell if hold in environment. It looks like it will. I use the bag to spare dive equipment for dive classes.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey T Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Light But Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: As a teen diver’s mom, reviews are huge. This duffel bag is big enough for all his gear and small & light weight to pack in the suitcase. Plus, the mesh and stitching is heavy duty! 🤩
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Great size bag
customer_reviews.text: Great size has plenty of room for family of 4 snorkeling gear with room to spare.Nice side pocket w zipper for personal belongings,would really like to see a shoulder strap option esp for a big this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This holds all the snorkel gear for a family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa, Fl Momma

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made duffle. It's nice and large can easy hold 2 peoples equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Forman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but prefer a pocket accessible from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Kayak King

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to use on a trip to Hawaii. This bag held 3 snorkeling masks, inflatable life-vests, 3 pairs of water shoes, and beach towels with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size.
customer_reviews.text: The duffel bag is the perfect size we were looking for to meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: S. P.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very compact
customer_reviews.text: So far looks good going to use it this coming weekend, so we will see how it works
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This bag held both our gear. With plenty of room for extra clothes, towels & shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BFinstad

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a great bag - testing it out this weekend!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great bag - testing it out this weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ross

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag so my diving gear! It’s a lot more spacious than I thought which means I’ll have room to grow my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Good Dive Bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Very light weight and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need, fits all my dive gear!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for boat life vests.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Fits 5 adult life vests and 2 kids vests with no problem. Been looking for something to store these on the boat and this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond L Souza Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: It holds all of my gear adequately and seems to be made from hardy material that will stay together with use.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the money. Fit your mask, find, snorkel, and other gear no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ct

customer_reviews.title: Spacious for all your diving gear
customer_reviews.text: Extra room for your fins, wetsuit, BCD, and all your personal gear and accessories. Easy to rinse your gear with the mesh material and quick to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag for dive gear
customer_reviews.text: Great size, able to hold all our dive gear, easy to keep gear organized and transporting to the dive site. Each bag can hold two sets of gear but the bag is heavy at this point. Easily able to hold one set of gear including mask fins and snorkel, regulator, and bcd. Good find!
customer_reviews.author: tlekan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome that it packs into itself and holds all my essentials.
customer_reviews.author: E W

customer_reviews.title: Bag can be folded up if needed great set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband for his birthday and he loves it. The bag is very nice it can be folded up , the gear was exactly what he was looking for he is an avid diver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mesha bag
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I haven't try it for diving yet, but It looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: Use for my snowmobile gear, works well. Lots of space for storing/moving all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Harlee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My daughter is scuba certified and is starting to buy the things she needs. This was a Christmas present.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Medders

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: The bag packs into itself for storing ing your suitcase and unfolds to a good size bag. Looks sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used once.  Worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: I used it once to carry two sets of USD snorkeling equipment. It worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: wallace mebane

customer_reviews.title: Large and roomy!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is actually a little to big but it is made very well and drains well.
customer_reviews.author: Connie R. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Good for light gear. Bad for heavy duty work.
customer_reviews.text: I used it for rafting and it wasn’t strong enough for the job. Loved the bag - just pushed it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Great product, fits long fins and everything else for freediving! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Liran

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Put a smile on my face opening the product. Well made and nice large size!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Payne

customer_reviews.title: Happy custermer
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, just as described. I'll test it out in Coxumel next week.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Northrup

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: This holds all of our items with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dive bag! Fits the whole family’s snorkel gear and then some!
customer_reviews.author: Cody DiBella

customer_reviews.title: Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, it's huge, bought two more, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: steve s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to store spare life jackets in my boat and it works perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Charlesboy

customer_reviews.title: plus a nice discreet side pocket for anything you don't want visible ...
customer_reviews.text: very large, can actually fit my gear for muay thai, brazilian jiu jitsu, towels, changes of clothes, boxing gloves, shin guards, head gear, etc, plus a nice discreet side pocket for anything you don't want visible to the world through the nice breathable mesh. overall very pleased so far. seems pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Rayna Brand

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big with pockets on the inside.
customer_reviews.text: We get to fully try it out in Feb 2020. It fit all the snorkeling gear for two with room for two more the masks are full face so they are bigger than normal masks. Made well and seems like it will work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Morgan

customer_reviews.title: awesome, holds kick board
customer_reviews.text: awesome, holds kick board, 2 sets of goggles, 2 sets of lap fins, towels, toiletries and has a zippered pocket for keys, wallet and still extra space
customer_reviews.author: phil13

product_meta.title: Athletico Mesh Dive Duffel Bag for Scuba or Snorkeling - XL Mesh Travel Duffle for Scuba Diving and Snorkeling Gear & Equipment - Dry Bag Holds Mask, Fins, Snorkel, and More
feature_bullets: ALL IN ONE HIGH CAPACITY DIVING BAG – XL Heavy Duty 37” x 15” X 15" Mesh Bag Stores All Your Equipment For Scuba Diving Or Snorkeling. Perfect for travel, fits your fins, goggles, mask, wetsuit, regulator, shoes, BCD and more.

BUILT FOR THE RIGORS OF TRAVEL BUT EASY ON THE POCKETBOOK - Our Snorkel Bag is built to last, while keeping the price tag down. Constructed of durable 600D Polyester and mesh, the dive bag is functional, yet durable.
EASY TO CARRY - Carry it over your shoulder or hand carry as a tote.

LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE DESIGN – Open air mesh Design allows for easy drying, avoiding mold or mildew on your dive equipment. Rinse your gear right in the bag, and allow to air dry. Ideal for all water sports - Scuba, Snorkeling, Swim, Diving, Surfing and more. Perfect for travel by plane or car.
BACKED BY THE ATHLETICO 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - If your are not satisfied with your new Athletico Dive Duffel for any reason, simply return it for a full refund, no questions asked!
